titles.title: United States Optimal Use of Trade to Develop Outerwear and Outdoor Recreation Act
U.S. OUTDOOR Act
To provide for duty-free treatment of certain recreational performance outerwear, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/18/2014--Introduced. United States Optimal Use of Trade to Develop Outerwear and Outdoor Recreation Act or the U.S. OUTDOOR Act - Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the duty-free treatment of certain recreational performance outerwear.
